mymetal.calculate.calmechanics package

Submodules

mymetal.calculate.calmechanics.deformation module

deformation module

This module provides functions for calculating deformation matrices. Deformation analysis is important for studying the mechanical behavior of materials under stress.

Functions:

  • cal_deform_matrix: Calculate the deformation matrix for a given structure.

mymetal.calculate.calmechanics.deformation.cal_deform_matrix(initial_cell: array = None, deformed_cell: array = None) → array

To calculate the deformation matrix.

Parameters:

  • initial_cell (np.array) – initial configuration, column vector

  • deformed_cell (np.array) – deformed configuration, column vector

Returns:

a n*n matrix

Return type:

np.array

Raises:

ValueError – Input matrix cannot be None.

mymetal.calculate.calmechanics.strain module

mymetal.calculate.calmechanics.stress module

mymetal.calculate.calmechanics.stretch module

Module contents

calmechanics module

This module contains functions for mechanical calculations including deformation, strain analysis, and lattice stretching. These functions are essential for evaluating the mechanical properties of materials under different conditions.

Submodules:

  • deformation: Contains functions for calculating deformation matrices.

  • strain: Contains functions for calculating principal and shear strains.

  • stretch: Contains functions for calculating relative stretch and lattice stretching.
